project.title: [Client Redacted] - Cloud Platform Engineering R&D

challenge.summary: Automate the CSD Landing Zone Accelerator by integrating AWS Landing Zone customization and SAA Security Guard Rails while ensuring strict security standards for Authority to Operate (ATO).

deliverables: Needs analysis and architectural design with PoC implementation
Infrastructure as Code development (AWS CLI, SDK/API, CloudFormation, Terraform)
CI/CD implementation (CodePipeline, CodeCommit, CodeBuild, CodeDeploy, GitLab, GitHub)
IT Security Program aligned with ITSG standards
SSO Federation design with Azure Active Directory
Access Control Program ensuring appropriate RBAC

outcomes: ✅ Automated and secure cloud environment with streamlined CSD Landing Zone
✅ Infrastructure scalability and reusability across teams
✅ Robust security posture meeting all ITSG standards
✅ Effective knowledge transfer and documentation across organization
✅ First team to achieve ATO using AWS Secure Environment Accelerator
✅ Foundational architecture adopted across [Client Redacted] for government-wide deployment
